#summary Use as a library description

= Introduction =

This page will show how to use this software as a library


= Details =

* Download the appropiate part you want to use: mailApi(http://zir-mail-server.googlecode.com/files/mailApi.jar), mailClient(http://zir-mail-server.googlecode.com/files/mailClient.jar) or mailServer(http://zir-mail-server.googlecode.com/files/mailServer.jar) or any combinations of them.

* Download the javadocs if you want to: mailApi(http://zir-mail-server.googlecode.com/files/mailApi-javadoc.zip), mailClient(http://zir-mail-server.googlecode.com/files/mailClient-javadoc.zip), mailServer(http://zir-mail-server.googlecode.com/files/mailServer-javadoc.zip).

* Enjoy!
